description.value:
At 2nd level, you adopt a particular style of fighting as your specialty. Choose one of the following options. You can't take a Fighting Style option more than once, even if you later get to choose again.

@Compendium[dnd5e.classfeatures.8YwPFv3UAPjWVDNf]{Archery}

@Compendium[dnd5e.classfeatures.MQJEJDPTC00H6YSR]{Blind Fighting}

@Compendium[dnd5e.classfeatures.zSlV0O2rQMdoq6pB]{Defense}

@Compendium[dnd5e.classfeatures.NISEB50OCGNYVFQT]{Druidic Warrior}

@Compendium[dnd5e.classfeatures.hCop9uJrWhF1QPb4]{Dueling}

@Compendium[dnd5e.classfeatures.T3YO5GFJUL9GLW2Q]{Interception}

@Compendium[dnd5e.classfeatures.OEPY74VVFCX5E5LY]{Thrown Weapon Fighting}

@Compendium[dnd5e.classfeatures.mHcSjcHJ8oZu3hkb]{Two-Weapon Fighting}
